title: Soldiers in Sinai: a peacekeeping story
creator_credit: Pierre des Bonnet and United Nations Television
brief_description: A basic film on the setting up of a UN Emergency Force - men flown to the Sinai Desert on short notice to take up positions between two opposing lines, for the peace keeping operation that followed in the wake of 1973 war in the Middle East. Shows how troops from many nations learn to work together as a unique international peace force.
